messages.message:
Hi <!subteam^SQ3KR3V17|@Software Engineers>!

@Jessica is building map-records support into the *IBDoc Widget*, which powers the frontend of Refiner 5 and  Marketplace's new Flow Run capabilities.

*She needs examples of Map Records possibilities:*

• Whole document as record
• each page as record
• custom mappers that result in multiple records per page
• custom mappers that result in multiple pages per record
• custom mappers that result in only a subset of the document being mapped to a record

Could folks (@Kerry @dlluncor?) with lots of record mapping experience chip in links to such datasets if available?
Is this a frontend display question or a technical question? Because I believe that no matter what, the resulting format is the same?
I have a lot of examples! @Jessica, do you want to put a time on my calendar this thursday or friday to go over this together?

all my test cases are the flows that begin with “map-record-*.ibflow”

However, they are just test examples — so they demonstrate the use of the functionality — but what Kerry is referring to is likely much more interesting.

But to see  how to setup these various map record approaches is here: https://dogfood.instabase.com/apps/flow/ib_eng/tests/fs/Test%20Drive/tests/general/single-flows/workflows/
I don’t have any but I’ve seen the ones @Kerry has had and they are really good examples! Also @Hari might have some re the table extraction techniques at the company offsite?
